# rounded

**Type Property**

A rounded rectangle button, designed for text.

## Declaration

```swift
static var rounded: NSButton.BezelStyle { get }
```

## Discussion

Rounded buttons are common within the body of a window or alert. To configure a button as the default button, set the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSButton/keyEquivalent] property to the carriage return character (`\r`, ASCII `0xd`). The system draws the default button prominently using the accent color to indicate that the user can press the return key to invoke the button’s action.

## Properties

- **inline**: A button that has a solid round-rectangle border background.
- **recessed**: A bezel style appropriate for use in scope bars and title bar accessories, similar to the bookmarks bar in Safari.
- **regularSquare**: A rectangular button with a two-point border, designed for icons.
- **roundedDisclosure**: A bezel style for use with a vertically expanding and collapsing disclosure button.
- **roundRect**: A bezel style appropriate for use as an action or auxiliary button in scope bars and title bar accessories.
- **texturedRounded**: A bezel style appropriate for use in the toolbar or title bar regions of a window.
